summary.span: 命名空间包含可用于在 .NET Framework 应用程序中实现缓存的类型。

span.span: The namespace contains types that let you implement caching in NET Framework applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命名空间中的类提供一种使用诸如 ASP.NET 中缓存功能的方法，但不会在 `System.Web` 程序集上产生依赖。The classes in this namespace provide a way to use caching facilities like those in ASP.NET, but without a dependency on the `System.Web` assembly. > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]中引入了 命名空间中的输出缓存功能和类型。The output caching functionality and types in the namespace were introduced in [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]. 此命名空间中提供的缓存类型提供了以下功能：The caching types that are provided in this namespace offer the following features: - 所有 .NET Framework 的应用程序（而不仅仅是 ASP.NET）都可以访问缓存。Caching is accessible to all .NET Framework applications (not just ASP.NET). - 缓存可扩展。Caching is extensible. - 你可以创建自定义缓存提供程序。You can create custom caching providers. 例如，可以创建在数据库、自定义对象或文件系统中存储缓存数据的自定义提供程序，而不是使用默认的内存中缓存引擎。For example, instead of using the default in-memory cache engine, you can create custom providers that store cache data in databases, in custom objects, or in the file system.
